We will be posting them on our channel.

Author: icohunter1024
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Traveler Token have created own blockchain ecosystem, specifically designed to give travel companies the ability to host distributed nodes, giving them a way to more securely and effectively collaborate with partners and manage customer data. The TLT ecosystem lets travel companies improve their existing IT systems using blockchain technology by making it possible to maintain accurate and accessible inventories of the services they offer — from an airline’s available seats to a hotel’s bookings for a night. Partnered companies can use these inventories for applications to effectively eliminate problems like price inflation or the dreaded double booking.

This will happen gradually due to security concerns over potential early bugs in the system and the associated need to protect consortium members and their customers from breaches of private information.

Author: theKryptoGuy
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Can I use Jaxx wallet to transfer my tokens?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: The Jaxx wallet supports the ERC20 standard, so you will not lose your TLT if you contribute using such an address. However, Jaxx is selective about what tokens they fully integrate and opaque in their decision-making process; we are pursuing their cooperation. In the event Jaxx does not fully integrate the TLT, you can always make use of the ability to export/import your private keys.

Author: Cryptoticker
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: What standard do the tokens use?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: The initial tokens disbursed during the token sale will be ERC20 standard tokens on the Ethereum platform. When the overall TLT system is operational, the ERC20 tokens will be exchanged on a one-for-one basis with the native TLT token; this native token will likely follow any prevailing Ethereum standards to improve interoperability between the networks.

Author: Cryptomaster1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Can you give me a quick rundown of how I can get involved in this project?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: 1. In order to participate in our token sale please register with your email on our website or send an email to ico@travelxite.com. We will send out a SAFT contract with all the required information.  2. In order to participate in the TLT token generation event, a wallet which supports the ERC20 token standard is required. We recommend using: MetaMask Parity Mist MEW  3. Don't miss out the presale early bird discount: During pre-sale you get 30% discount for an investment equal to or greater than 50 ETH. 20% discount for an investment in the 1-50 ETH range. 15% discount for an investment below 1 ETH

Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Body: The token will be distributed as follow: 67% free market, 20% Token reserve, 10% Team, Advisors, Early supporters, 3% Bounty Program.

Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Author: theKryptoGuy
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: OKay, thanks for the info. So how can I participate?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thank you for the question! The thing is, TravelerToken is not merely an existing business concept that has been "put on the blockchain" and repackaged, as is the current trend. The distributed architecture and economic design are intrinsic to the model. TravelerToken is not a singular business itself, but an infrastructure to unite a consortium of businesses. Therefore, with sufficient marketing efforts, we are confident that we will be able to succeed in the long run.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: 1. In order to participate in our token sale please register with your email on our website or send an email to ico@travelxite.com. We will send out a SAFT contract with all the required information.  2. In order to participate in the TLT token generation event, a wallet which supports the ERC20 token standard is required. We recommend using: MetaMask Parity Mist MEW  3. Don't miss out the presale early bird discount: During pre-sale you get 30% discount for an investment equal to or greater than 50 ETH. 20% discount for an investment in the 1-50 ETH range. 15% discount for an investment below 1 ETH.

Author: cryptocurrency1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Author: ezzapakistan
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: I have a few questions:  1. What can I do with my tokens once I receive them? Can I sell them? 2. Will team tokens be blocked for a certain amount of time? 3. Will the TLT tokens be mined? If yes, when will that start?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: After the sale is complete, all contributors will be able to transfer their tokens the same as any other ERC20 token. Tokens allocated for team members will be disbursed on a standard vesting schedule. It is the responsibility of each potential purchaser of TLT tokens to determine whether the purchaser can legally obtain TLT tokens in their jurisdiction or can then transfer or resell TLT tokens to another party in any given jurisdiction, in which different laws and regulations may apply. TLT tokens will never be mined; the supply of ERC20 TLT tokens is fixed and when migrated from Ethereum to the native system, the supply will self-adjust via automatic 'cashback' rewards.

Author: stevensteel
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Why is the TravelerToken based on the Ethereum platform?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Well, Ethereum provides the most mature infrastructure and tools for building complex Dapps and has a strong community of developers working to continually improve the ecosystem. The TravelerToken will not always run on top of Ethereum; it will transition to a stand-alone permissioned network. However, we will always strive to maintain interoperability with Ethereum, and other new decentralised application platforms that come along (i.e. EOS, DFinity), in order to leverage their communities and the applications built for them.

Author: Cryptomaster1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Author: cryptocurrency1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Is there any bonus or discount during pre-sale and main sale?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Yes, there is! During pre-sale you get 30% discount for an investment equal or greater than 50 ETH. 20% for an investment in the 1-50 ETH range. 15% discount for an investment below 1 ETH. During main sale, the percentage of discount offered will gradually decrease. 20% discount for an investment equal or greater than 50 ETH. 15% for an investment in the 1-50 ETH range. 10% for an investment below 1 ETH. Starting from the second week and onward, no discounts will be offered.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thank you for the question! The TLT system consists of a set of interlocking P2P protocols that will allow members to keep their data wherever they like, choose fine-grained access privileges, and yet query the entire network like a relational database. So yes, they will be able to keep track of their data and the state of their money!

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thanks for the question! The Bancor protocol is not a blockchain platform like Bitcoin or Ethereum. It is a mechanism to enable so-called "smart-tokens"; the idea is to endow token contracts with a reserve pool of another token or compatible currency and thus enable continuous, asynchrous exchange through the token contract itself. This continuous liquidity and asynchronous price-discovery has a number of benefits outlined in the Bancor whitepaper. We will not implement the Bancor protocol directly, but rather a modified version of it adapted to the specific needs of the TLT system.

Author: theKryptoGuy
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Will you offer a wallet on your platform or do I have to create one before I can buy tokens?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Members of the consortium will be responsible for meeting KYC requirements and giving authorization for TLT wallets on the native system. We expect this will not be particularly restrictive and that it will be very much like the standard sign-up procedure for a user account on a website; however, you will only have to do this once! You will be able to select what information you want the member businesses that you patronize to share with each other, choosing the desired balance between convenience and privacy.

Author: Cryptotickerr
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: I want to write about TravelerToken on my blog, but I need more info - What is your expected revenue in the next couple of years?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: The TLT foundation will be a non-profit entity. If you mean the combined revenue of consortium members, we hope to bring in large partners over the next three quarters that will exceed 100million in their combined revenue.

Author: ezzapakistan
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Travelcoins has an option to cancel bookings free of charge as they can be sold to another customer. Will such an option be available for TravelerToken? Or is there going to be a cancellation insurance, for instance?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Great question! TravelerToken is not directly a service platform. Members of the consortium who operate such customer-facing platforms will decide whether they offer guarantees like that. However, one of the aims behind establishing a common technical infrastructure is to enable businesses to easily make such offers and to enable customized and cheaper insurance packages.

Author: stevensteel
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: In terms of innovation, what sets TravelerToken apart from other blockchain travel businesses, like TravelCoin, for example?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: TravelerToken is not merely an existing business concept that has been "put on the blockchain" and repackaged, as is the current trend. The distributed architecture and economic design are intrinsic to the model. TravelerToken is not a singular business itself, but an infrastructure to unite a consortium of businesses.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Ethereum provides the most mature infrastructure and tools for building complex Dapps and has a strong community of developers working to continually improve the ecosystem. The TravelerToken will not always run on top of Ethereum; it will transition to a stand-alone permissioned network. However, we will always strive to maintain interoperability with Ethereum, and other new decentralised application platforms that come along (i.e. EOS, DFinity), in order to leverage their communities and the applications built for them.

Author: Cryptomaster1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: How is the TravelerToken structured legally?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: It is a permissioned network controlled by the consortium foundation. All consortium members will be legally bound by the foundation and users will have to submit KYC information.

Author: theKryptoGuy
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: There is so much included in the project. How have you come around to such ideas about structure, foundation, and so on?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: We are long-time followers of the complementary and crypto-currency movements, and dedicated adherents to the ethos of decentralization. All the pieces that went into crafting the TLT concept came from hundreds of hours of research and involvement in the respective communities.

Author: stevensteel
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: I have a very important question for the tech team: On the white paper, Page 43 reads that similar token systems can arise and that TravelerToken is therefore not unique. This contradicts the claim that the project is unique. What do you have to say about that?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: In terms of technology, they could arise later if they used the open-source code that we develop and that the TLT foundation will eventually release. In terms of economics, they could copy the model that we are proving and apply it to other groups of businesses with aligned concerns and interests, and that would be a very good thing.

Author: cryptocurrency1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: How will accommodation owners be paid out?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Accommodation owners can choose if they want to be paid out in Crypto or Fiat, but they will get extra benefits if they choose to be paid in TravelerToken. The same applies to the customers.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: There are a few - check these when you have time just to have a better idea about the environment: CryptoCribs, Winding Tree, TravelCoin, Smart trip, Lockchain ICO, Loyyal (partially - loyalty platform also covering traveling). They are different from TLT in that they are single businesses or platforms; they are not a consortium aiming to work with existing industry leaders, they all rely on public blockchain platforms that suffer from scaling issues, and they are practically limited to niche use-cases.

They are different from TLT in that they are single businesses or platforms; they are not a consortium aiming to work with existing industry leaders, they all rely on public blockchain platforms that suffer from scaling issues, and they are practically limited to niche use-cases.

Author: Danielpeters
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Will there be an airdrop of any kind for the TravelerToken ICO?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hi Daniel! Promo tokens -- providing a discount on the sale price -- will be airdropped before the start of the open public portion of the sale. Any TLT left unredeemed from the amount allocated to the Bounty Program will be airdropped after the completion of the token sale.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Great question! Following in the historical use of the word token, the TLT directly represents a promise of goods or services from member businesses. Unlike a coin, whose value is backed by the scarcity-driven price of precious metals, or a fiat note, whose value is backed by the promise of a government, the TravelerToken is backed directly by real commerce.

Author: Cryptomaster1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: I've been wondering...will the token rise in value? Is there any functionality for this?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: The initial ERC20 token will have a fixed supply. The TLT debit card and early corporate backers accepting the token will drive commercial demand. Demand is likely to increase dramatically as more businesses are onboarded into the consortium.

Author: notabene
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️

Author: kipoel
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: I like this information here, as far as I know that some travel project working on their own way they just making cooperation with some hotels, travel agent, but here it working together with a bigger and wider range of partners. That should be better from the existing project.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hi notabene!  There are many ways in which the TravelerToken can be used on TravelXite's platform:  1. In exchange for a duration of premium membership, granting access to member perks on listings from participating agencies, immunity from deposit requirements, loyalty/cashback tokens, and entry into lotteries for member events. 2. In exchange for the cost of a booking, in whole, which further confers for that booking immunity from deposit requirements and gives loyalty/cashback tokens. 3. In exchange for access to TravelXite’s SaaS and value-added services. 4. There will be a Debit Card that enables the holder to pay with the TravelerToken in the local currency and to withdraw money worldwide.  Hope it can help!

Author: Cryptoticker
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hi there! I would like to write about TravelerToken on our website, but I need some information from you. How are you going to make it possible to exchange TLT tokens into local currencies anywhere in the world using the TLT debit card? Which programmes will be able to do that?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hi there! Firstly, thank you for showing interest in our project! Your support is always appreciated! To answer your question, we would do that via our partnership with Wirecard bank. Furthermore, existing ATM and payment network solutions already allow for withdrawal in local currencies, so that wouldn't be a problem!

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Yup! This is why we are creating a consortium of services, which makes everything much more accessible for travelers. Thank you for your support!

Author: peterexpert
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: I'm curious...why do you prefer Bancor over Bitcoin or Ethereum?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Well, we find that there is no need to compete. While the TravelerToken system will act to reduce the number of intermediaries by creating a common infrastructure that can be leveraged, there will always be a need for companies that spend time and effort on pulling customers in, providing them with a nice experience, and offering support services. That will always add a bit of cost in the middle between the supplier and the consumer. The difference will be that instead of multiple intermediaries adding very little value to the end product, there will be at most one or perhaps more where actual value can be added. And that's where we come into the picture!

Author: rodrigalb
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: I have to say that I love the idea, but I have an important question. How will you make a profit?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hi Rodrigalb. Thank you for the support!  The TLT foundation will be a non-profit entity governed democratically by its member businesses and token stakeholders. It will fund operations through a combination of the endowment of TLT reserved for this purpose and modest fees from members of the consortium.

Author: rodrigalb
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thanks for the quick reply!  I'd also like to know if you have scouted any competitors and, if so, what is your competitive advantage?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Our pleasure to help!  Indeed, there are a few competitors - check these when you have time just to have a better idea about the environment: CryptoCribs, Winding Tree, TravelCoin, Smart trip, Lockchain ICO, Loyyal (partially - loyalty platform also covering traveling). They are different from TLT in that they are single businesses or platforms; they are not a consortium aiming to work with existing industry leaders, they all rely on public blockchain platforms that suffer from scaling issues, and they are practically limited to niche use-cases.

They are different from TLT in that they are single businesses or platforms; they are not a consortium aiming to work with existing industry leaders, they all rely on public blockchain platforms that suffer from scaling issues, and they are practically limited to niche use-cases.

Author: cryptocurrency1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Quick question: Can I use Jaxx wallet to transfer my TLT tokens?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thanks for the question! The Jaxx wallet supports the ERC20 standard, so you will not lose your TLT if you contribute using such an address. However, Jaxx is selective about what tokens they fully integrate and opaque in their decision-making process; we are pursuing their cooperation. But don't worry - in the event Jaxx does not fully integrate the TLT, you can always make use of the ability to export/import your private keys.

Author: Cryptomaster1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: May I know what standard do the tokens use? Correct me if I'm wrong, but does TLT use the ERC20 standard?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: That is correct! The initial tokens disbursed during the token sale will be ERC20 standard tokens on the Ethereum platform. When the overall TLT system is operational, the ERC20 tokens will be exchanged on a one-for-one basis with the native TLT token; this native token will likely follow any prevailing Ethereum standards to improve interoperability between the networks.

Body: Hi...thanks for the project! May I know how many people is the whitelist limited to?

Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thanks for the question! There are no limitations on the number of pre-sale participants. The only restriction is that the standard KYC/AML requirements be met.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hi JungleOnion! Thank you for the question! And yes, those two features that you mentioned are merely a few out of many features that we offer our users. Besides being a blockchain-based data sharing infrastructure and payment system for the travel industry, TravelerToken (TLT) provides a shared technical and economic infrastructure that will form the basis of a new standard for business practices as monetary systems evolve away from fiat. To do that, the TLT system consists of a set of interlocking P2P protocols that will allow members to keep their data wherever they like, choose fine-grained access privileges, and yet query the entire network like a traditional relational database. Moreover, the TravelerToken is backed by real commerce, has a stabilizing built-in reserve and exchange mechanism and incentivizes demand by rewarding spending with automatic 'cashback' rewards. As a result, travelers can pay for all their travel needs and even have a convenient option for any sort of payment in local currencies without the hassles of Forex.  Hope that answers your question! For more information, feel free to check out our whitepaper or our one-pager.

Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thanks...I'm really curious about this project, and I have a question for the tech team: Why do you choose to use your own blockchain?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thank you for the question! Public blockchain platforms suffer from serious scaling and performance issues. To enable highly scalable, low latency, and cost-effective fully decentralized systems and to eliminate the need for semi-centralized approaches, significant future advances will need to be made in blockchain technology. Projects such as TrueBit, the Lightning/Raiden networks, IPFS and Filecoin, Mysterium, and IOTA are steps in that direction. But these are merely the precursors.

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: http://i68.tinypic.com/iyzq7d.png  TravelerToken - A blockchain-based data sharing infrastructure and payment system for the travel industry that will help businesses to improve the quality of their services and reduce costs to end consumers.  TLT’s mission is to join the leading travel and tourism companies, universities, and the open-source community in an effort to build up a shared technical and economic infrastructure. This new infrastructure represents a simplified standard that not only minimizes costs to the customer but gives businesses the tools they need to stay with the times.  Key Token Sale information:  Name: TravelerToken Symbol: TLT Official Website Whitepaper  JOIN OUR TELEGRAM GROUP  Pre-sale starts: Now open! Pre-sale ends: 20/05/2018 Sale starts: 21/05/2018 Sale ends: When the hardcap is hit! Hard Cap: 100.000 ETH Token Exchange Rate: 1 ETH = 5000 TLT Minimum Contribution: 0.2 ETH Contribution Channels: ETH Bounty Program: to be announced  Accepted Nationalities: Every nationality, except United States, Singapore, Socialist Republic of Vietnam, People’s Republic of China or resident of a country where American embargoes and sanctions are in force, namely Iran, North Korea, Syria, Sudan, or Cuba. Exchanges: Planning to be listed on the largest cryptocurrency exchanges.  The exact number of tokens generated depends on the amount of funds contributed. Upon reaching the hard cap, the token generation event will end immediately. Tokens will be transferable once the token generation event is completed.  Foundation goals  The primary goal is to provide a forum for stakeholders and contributing universities, technical institutes, and open-source developers to pool their efforts with the aim of building blockchain and smart-contract related technology for the travel industry.  Establishing a global standard for the travel industry based on blockchain technology Providing an application layer that works seamlessly within existing systems such as ERP, CRM, etc...  Reducing the overhead associated with intermediaries and payment settlement Nurturing a culture of transparency and cooperation among members of the consortium  How TLT is Going to Improve the Travel Industry  The core idea is to create a system which is scalable, borderless, democratic, and trustworthy. Blockchain technology allows TLT to create a federated, distributed network over the internet enabling a host of data sharing applications and enabling smart-contract based services, such as a joint asset registry and information access management. By reducing the number of parties involved in - and ultimately, the complexity of - online booking and worldwide payments, travel becomes easier and less expensive.  The TLT system will be operated by a consortium of airlines, hoteliers, transportation providers and other related businesses. Each member of the consortium can continue to use their preferred data storage strategy - TLT’s new peer-to-peer protocols simply connects their locally stored data into a single virtual directory, making it searchable and downloadable according to permissions.  Data integrity is ensured by the use of a modular blockchain architecture. The consortium will be governed by an open foundation, whose aim is to the further develop, maintain, and improve the infrastructure.  http://i67.tinypic.com/xlcy1v.png  Token distribution and funding  http://i65.tinypic.com/27xlyqe.png  Token Distribution 67 % Free Market 20 % Token Reserve 10 % Team, Advisors, Early Supporters 3% Bounty Program  Token Funding 35 % Research & Development 25 % Sales & Marketing 20 % Partner Acquisition 10% ETH Reserve 10 % Admin, Operations, Founding, Legal  Early Bird Discounts  http://i65.tinypic.com/30k8s9c.png                                                                                                  Pre-Sale: 23/04/2018 - 20/05/2018 30 % (Above 50 ETH) 20 % (1-50 ETH) 15 % (Below 1 ETH)  Public Sale: 21/05/2018 20 % (Above 50 ETH) 15 % (Below 1 ETH) 7.5 % (1-50 ETH)  Week 2+: 0 %  The Roadmap  http://i67.tinypic.com/nn4hau.png  Team  Thorben Biesenbach - CEO Nizar Qaabar- CTO Gunnar Maier - CSO Kathrin Funke - CBDO  Advisors  Franz Wollang - Managing Director at AllBlock Prashan Nagendra - CEO EFutures Private Limited Sven Schikarsky - Managing Director FTI Touristik  TLT’s Social Media channels  Facebook Twitter Telegram Instagram Reddit Medium

To answer your question - firstly, TravelerToken (TLT) is a blockchain-based data sharing infrastructure and payment system for the travel industry that will help businesses to improve the quality of their services and reduce costs to end consumers.  Secondly, TLT is also a shared technical and economic infrastructure that will form the basis of a new standard for business practices as monetary systems evolve away from fiat.  And thirdly, The TLT system consists of a set of interlocking P2P protocols that will allow members to keep their data wherever they like, choose fine-grained access privileges, and yet query the entire network like a traditional relational database. The TravelerToken is also backed by real commerce, has a stabilizing built-in reserve and exchange mechanism, incentivizes demand by rewarding spending with automatic 'cashback' rewards. For more information, feel free to check out our whitepaper and one-pager!

Author: cryptocurrency1
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hello! When will the Bounty Program go live? Soon?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Hi there! Thank you for the insightful questions! The initial ERC20 token has a fixed supply and it is likely to see increasing demand as we onboard more commercial partners. Users will already be able to pay with the token anywhere using the debit card. Furthermore, 20% of the token supply is set aside for the long-term maintenance of the foundation and will not be touched for a long while. Moreover, participants in the closed sale who have made particularly large contributions are subject to a lockup period, thus they will not be able to just "dump" the coin right after the ICO.  As for your last question: The TLT system is a so-called 'protocol layer'. It comprises a collection of fast peer-to-peer protocols that provide a rich framework for arbitrary applications; the Standard Asset Registry and the TravelerToken itself are two applications we've already defined, but provisions for general distributed computation to user specification are included. As a network run by a consortium of businesses, who are all known entities, the expensive high-security consensus mechanism that public blockchain platforms use can be substituted for an extremely efficient consortium consensus algorithm similar to those used in large-scale data centers; it is highly modular and the incorporates the newest understanding of state dependencies, ownership, and validity conditions to improve latency and through-put to near optimal levels. Furthermore, given such a pool of relatively trusted peers, a cutting edge technique for distributed database searching can be implemented without concern for excessive security measures. This technique bypasses the traditional dichotomy of using a single central search structure or inefficiently replicating the search structure to every peer (as done in all current blockchain platforms). It does this by allowing semantic information to be encoded into the connectivity of the peers themselves, letting the same greedy algorithms that perform communications routing between peers also directly resolve requests for items organized by semantic features. The advanced database queries this enables are unheard of for a fully distributed system, and it allows for the businesses to set extremely fine-grained access/search permissions for all of their data (wherever they choose to store it). These few examples underscore the fact that the TLT system is not just an attempt to rip off other successful projects, but has been engineered from the ground up to provide the modern infrastructure real businesses need, right now, to enable innovation, cut costs, and provide their customers with the best and most customizable service possible. Therefore, our budget of 100,000 ETH is justified.

Body: Hey Cryptoticker.  Thanks for your comment! The exact number of tokens generated will vary and depend on the amount of funds contributed. Upon reaching the hard cap, the token generation event will end immediately. Then, they will be transferable once the token generation event is completed, following this distribution: 67% free market, 20% Token reserve, 10% Team, Advisors, Early supporters, 3% Bounty Program.  Feel free to ask any questions, any time!

Author: ezzapakistan
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: Thank you for the prompt reply! Is there an estimate of when the TLT system be fully functional?

Author: Travelertoken
Title: [ANN] [TOKEN SALE] ✈️ TravelerToken: Spend Less. Travel More! ✈️
Body: No worries! We're glad to help! The current estimate for the full launch of the TLT system is in the last quarter of 2019.
